Title: You've Got Mold
Writer: Jason Katims (developed by), Gina Fattore, Justin W. Lo (staff writer)
Actors: Peter Krause, Lauren Graham, Dax Shepard, Monica Potter
Plot: Sarah (Lauren Graham) starts her new project with Hank (Ray Romano), meanwhile Kristina (Monica Potter) becomes the community counselor. Crosby (Dax Shepard) discovers mold in his house and...
